author: fhanik
msg: Fixed synchronization issues upon startup, and always using a soTimeout

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: NullPointerException in AreaAdditionUtil in a table-cell spanning multiple pages and with a marker.
Note: This is a hack to avoid the NPE. A problem remains. The markers will not be added if the first/last conditions cannot be determined.

author: gnodet
msg: When transforming DOM to Stax, use the W3CDOMStreamReader if possible (avoid transforming to a string and parsing)

author: gnodet
msg: Having two endpoints with the same key (even if one is a consumer and the other one a provider) is now forbidden
It was previously possible but lead to problems.

author: norman
msg: Rename config options and methods to better reflect the usage
